translations.chinese: 我十五日必定梁地，復從將軍。」
translations.english: Within 15 days I will certainly pacify Liang territory, then follow the general again."
Xiang Yu led troops east to attack Peng Yue.

translations.chinese: 漢王使酈食其說齊王田廣，罷守兵與漢和。
translations.english: King Han sent Li Yiji to persuade King Qi Tian Guang to dismiss his guarding troops and make peace with Han.

translations.chinese: 四年冬十月，韓信用蒯通計，襲破齊。
translations.english: In the tenth month of winter in the fourth year, Han Xin used Kuai Tong's plan and attacked, breaking Qi.
King Qi boiled Li Sheng and fled east to Gaomi.
